content: Enter the LDAP server without the port number.

comment.text: The "LdapServerTooltip" translation key is used to provide a tooltip when the user types into the LDAP server field, explaining that the port number should not be included. This appears as an inline help message next to the label for the LDAP server input field in the Connection Settings section of the Portal Settings page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic word 'المنفذ' (al-munfadh) is generally used for 'port' in a technical context. While acceptable, 'المنفذ' can also mean 'exit'. A more precise term might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: أدخل خادم LDAP بدون رقم البوابة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Մուտք գործեք LDAP սերվեր առանց պորտի համարի:' is a literal translation and sounds somewhat unnatural in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would be closer to 'Նշեք LDAP սերվերի հասցեն պորտի համարը չներառելով:' or 'Մուտքագրեք LDAP սերվերի հասցեն, պորտի համարը միացնել չէք պետք:'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Նշեք LDAP սերվերի հասցեն պորտի համարը չներառելով:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ໃສ່ຊື່ອານຸລັກຂໍ້ມູນ LDAP ໂດຍບໍ່ຕ້ອງໃສ່ເລກທີ່ຢູ່ຂອງພອດ' is a literal translation that doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of 'Enter the LDAP server without the port number'.  'ຊື່ອານຸລັກຂໍ້ມູນ' (name of the data) is redundant.  It would be better to simply say 'ໃສ່ຊິບເຊີບລ້າບ' (enter ldap server).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃສ່ຊິບເຊີບລ້າບໂດຍບໍ່ໃສ່ເລກທີ່ຢູ່ຂອງພອດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'ພອດ' might be replaced with a more commonly used term depending on the context. It's recommended to check the established terminology within the software/documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃສ່ຊິບເຊີບລ້າບໂດຍບໍ່ໃສ່ເລກທີ່ຢູ່ຂອງພອດ (Consider using a more common term for 'port' if applicable).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "LDAP සේවකයගේ ලිපිනය, පෝට් අංකය නොමැතිව ඇතුළත් කරන්න." is too literal. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning. 'LDAP සේවක ලිපිනය පෝට් අංකය හැර ඇතුළත් කරන්න' or 'LDAP සේවක ලිපිනය, පෝට් අංකය හැර, මෙහි ඇතුළත් කරන්න' would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP සේවක ලිපිනය පෝට් අංකය හැර ඇතුළත් කරන්න.
Унесите LDAP сервер без броја порта.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Unesite LDAP server bez broja porta' is technically correct but sounds slightly unnatural. A more natural phrasing would be 'Unesite adresu LDAP servera bez broja porta.' The current phrasing lacks the Serbian word for 'address' when referring to a server address.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Unesite adresu LDAP servera bez broja porta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Nhập máy chủ LDAP mà không có số cổng' is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Vietnamese. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nhập địa chỉ máy chủ LDAP (không bao gồm số cổng).
